meaningMnemonic:
Please <kanji>write down</kanji> and <kanji>put on</kanji> paper the facts, so we have a <vocabulary>record</vocabulary> of them. 

記載 refers to information that is recorded in some manner, typically in written, printed, or digital form.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
